education.institution: Raj Kumar Goel Institute Of Technology

highlights: Worked on internal project of the company with DevOps team.
I have worked on AWS, Docker, Django and written various Python scripts to automate the back-end tasks.
Technologies Used: Django, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, AWS, Scripting, Git, Docker, Ansible, and SQL.
Learned about AWS (Amazon Web Services) and it's cloud services like - S3, EC2, IAM, VPC etc.
Worked on in-house developed Learning Management System build on Moodle and deployed on AWS cloud.
As a campus ambassador, I have organised technical activities along with mentoring my juniors in Data structures and Python.
My responsibilities was to publicize their services and events, spreading word of mouth about the organization, and Social media outreach, etc.

projects.name: Cloud Automation Portal
projects.description: A web app build in Django backed with Docker & Ansible where a developer can fill the details of their PHP based project and specify server side configurations, after that our app can deploy their project in docker containers on a remote server using Ansible.

awards.title: Open Source Contributor
awards.summary: Participated in Kharagpur Winter Of Code 2017 organised by IIT KGP & contributed to Algorithms project of IIEST, Shibpur which is a GitHub repository to store implementation of some of the famous Data Structures and Algorithms.

awards.title: Campus Ambassador
awards.summary: Represented my college in Technex 2018 (Annual Technical Festival of IIT BHU) and attended a 3 day Ethical hacking workshop by EI Systems at IIT BHU.

awards.title: Zonal Representative
awards.summary: Represented my college in Cognizance 2018 (Annual Technical Festival of IIT Roorkee) and hosted their zonal visit at my college.

awards.title: Quiz Coordinator
awards.summary: Organised technical events under CSI local chapter TechXtreme, and successfully hosted Quiz competition with maximum participation among all events.
